mapper.select: select * from movie_comment where ${search} like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
select count(*) from movie_comment where user_key = ${user_key} and movie_cd = ${movie_cd}
mapper.insert: insert into movie_comment values( default, #{user_key}, #{movie_cd}, now(), ${comment_content}, default, null, default, #{comment_score} )
mapper.select: select comment_num, user_key, user_id, comment_write_date , movie_cd , comment_content, m.is_deleted, comment_like, comment_score from movie_comment m join user_info u using(user_key) where movie_cd = #{movie_cd} and m.is_deleted = false order by comment_write_date desc, comment_num desc limit 0, #{commentsCount}
select * from movie_comment where user_key = #{user_key} and movie_cd = #{movie_cd};
select user_key from user_like_movie_comment where comment_num = #{comment_num} and user_key = #{user_key}
mapper.update: update movie_comment set comment_like = comment_like + 1 where comment_num = #{comment_num}
update movie_comment set comment_content = #{comment_content}, comment_score = #{comment_score}, comment_write_date = now() where comment_num = #{comment_num}
mapper.select: select comment_num, user_key, user_id, comment_write_date , movie_cd , comment_content, m.is_deleted, comment_like, comment_score from movie_comment m join user_info u using(user_key) where movie_cd = #{movie_cd} and m.is_deleted = false order by ${sort_criteria} ${sort_sw}, comment_num desc limit #{commentsStart}, #{commentsCount}
